title: Akzidenz Don't Happen (Advanced Media at Arizona State University)
content:
Hello,  
 [Akzidenz Don't Happen](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200236/http:/vimeo.com/9682972) was created by students in [Advanced Media](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200236/http:/tannerwoodford.com/syllabus/2010s), a course in the [School of Design Innovation](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200236/http:/design.asu.edu/sdi/) at [Arizona State University](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200236/http:/www.asu.edu/). For more context on this work-in-progress, [see other videos from this class](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200236/http:/typophile.com/node/68269) or [read the official project description on the course syllabus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200236/http:/tannerwoodford.com/syllabus/2010s/1.html). The video was produced by Nick Cote, Erika Granberry, Raymond Holling, Erin Kwiatkowski, Chelsea MacPherson, Erika Palestini, Melody Sanchez and Jesse Weischedel.

[http://vimeo.com/9682972](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200236/http:/vimeo.com/9682972)

[Untitled](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200236/http:/vimeo.com/9682972) from [Nick Cote](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200236/http:/vimeo.com/user2385978) on [Vimeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200236/http:/vimeo.com/).

We look forward your feedback.  
Thank you.
author: tannerwoodford
